about.metaDescription: Learning Studio is a one-stop space for journaling, practice, meditation, and focus.
about.heading: About
about.intro: Learning Studio is an independent project led by long-term learners, offering trustworthy notes, focus tools, and meditation guides.
missionList: Make practice more effective: treat tools as a workspace and minimise context switching.
Help knowledge stick: rely on thoughtful journaling and regular reviews.
Keep body and mind steady: weave meditation, breathing, and rhythm into everyday focus.
about.legalLinks: We take safety and data use seriously—see our <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy> and <disclaimer>Disclaimer</disclaimer> for details.

privacy.metaDescription: Learning Studio privacy policy covering data collection, usage, cookies, advertising, and third-party services.
privacy.heading: Privacy Policy

dataCollected.title: What we collect
items: Essential data that keeps the site working (such as anonymised visit analytics).
Information you voluntarily submit in forms (for example, email or feedback).
Browser storage used to remember your preferences.

dataUsage.title: How we use it
items: Maintain, improve, and troubleshoot site functionality.
Compile aggregate analytics to understand usage and plan new features.
Respond to your requests for support or inquiries.

cookies.title: Cookies and local storage
cookies.description: We use cookies and local storage to improve your experience (for example, remembering preferences). You can clear or disable them in your browser, but some features may stop working.

advertising.title: Advertising and third parties
advertising.description: We may work with carefully selected partners to serve ads. Those providers can use cookies or similar tech to deliver content aligned with your interests.
items: Third-party vendors (including Google) use cookies to serve ads when you visit this or other sites.
These cookies allow them to display personalised ads based on your visits.
You can manage personalisation via the Google Ads Settings page.
advertising.note: You may also use industry opt-out portals to reduce third-party advertising.

retention.title: Data retention
retention.description: Unless the law requires otherwise, we retain data only for as long as necessary for the purposes above. You can clear local storage any time to remove on-device preferences.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.description: You may contact us to access, update, or delete your information, and withdraw consent where applicable. We respond within a reasonable timeframe.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: If you have questions about this policy or want to exercise your rights, email contact@example.com.

updates.title: Policy updates
updates.description: If we make significant changes, we will update this page and refresh the effective date.

disclaimer.metaDescription: Learning Studio disclaimer: information is for reference only and not professional advice.
disclaimer.heading: Disclaimer
disclaimer.intro: The materials on this site—including posts, tools, examples, and links—are for learning and reference only. They do not constitute professional advice (legal, medical, investment, or any certified field).
accuracyList: We strive to keep content accurate and timely, but offer no guarantee on completeness or suitability.
Tools and services may become temporarily unavailable due to maintenance or third-party issues. We are not liable for resulting direct or indirect losses.
disclaimer.linksDescription: This site may link to third-party websites. We are not responsible for their content, privacy practices, or policies. Access them at your own discretion.
disclaimer.riskDescription: Assess whether the materials and tools meet your needs, and consult qualified professionals when you require certified advice.
